name: Box.net Web Document
summary: Learn about .WEBDOC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Even though Box.net supports the proprietary WEBDOC format, users commonly use other document formats such as .DOCX, .PPTX, and .RTF.

description: Online document created using Zoho Editor, a Web browser application used to edit documents for the Box.net file sharing service; saves the document in a proprietary Box.net format that is only editable with the online Zoho Editor; can be viewed with the Box.net offline Box Sync application.
